EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2013.Email Post Event - Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us at Tricentis Accelerate 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!-- -->
Dear Tricentis Clients and Partners,
We’d like to take a moment to thank you for joining us at Tricentis Accelerate 2013. We hope you enjoyed the event as much as we did.
We are always looking to improve the quality of our events. Please take a few moments to fill out this survey <http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1442788/Tricentis-Accelerate-2013>. Thank you for your feedback, and thanks for your contribution to Accelerate. We look forward to seeing you again next year, if not sooner! <!--
<http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/register/>
Don’t miss this chance to join the Tricentis experts and register. <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/register/>
All attendees will be automatically entered in a drawing to win an iPad Mini – just a little way of saying thanks for attending.
To view the full agenda and learn more about the event, visit: accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/en/solutions-day?utm_source=Event&utm_medium=E-Mail&utm_campaign=Accelerate_2013>
I look forward to meeting you in person.-->
Best Regards,
Ajay Murthy
Chief Marketing Officer
Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
